Mon: Hello little human. Welcome to my hidden woods.
Tue: I'm glad you found this place. It's quite lonely here after so many years.
Wed: I do love the woods. I couldn't spend enough time outdoors...not that I've ever been indoors. I'm a tree, I suppose.
Thu: My friend, my little human: songs like trees bear fruit only in their own time and their own way: and sometimes they are withered untimely.
Fri: I never say anything unless it is worth taking a long...time...to say.
Sat: Come here whenever you'd like. Especially if you want to get away from the city.
Sun: I am not going to tell you my name, not yet at any rate.#$e#For one thing it would take a long while: my name is growing all the time, and I've lived a very long, long time; so my name is like a story.#$e#Real names tell you the story of things they belong to in my language, in the Old Entist as you might say.
